## SearchConfigWithApiKey interface

Configuration options for [AnswersCore](./answers-core.answerscore.md)<!-- -->, which includes the options from [BaseSearchConfig](./answers-core.basesearchconfig.md)<!-- -->, but requires apiKey.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SearchConfigWithApiKey extends BaseSearchConfig 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseSearchConfig](./answers-core.basesearchconfig.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [apiKey](./answers-core.searchconfigwithapikey.apikey.md) | string | The api key of the answers experience which will be sent as a query param. |
|  [token?](./answers-core.searchconfigwithapikey.token.md) | never | <i>(Optional)</i> token should NOT be provided along with apiKey. |
